transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haan ji bolo. Manish ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Manish ji Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye boliye Pravesh ji.
Executive: Ji ji. Sir wo Manisha ka manager baat kar raha tha main to aapka discussion chal raha tha regarding jo issue aaya tha hamare paas.
Customer: Haan haan to baat hua na sab matter jo maine unko bataya ye to aapke discuss hui hogi.
Executive: Okay. Sir dekhiye do cheeze hain isme. Sir dekhiye Shailesh ji jo GST ke owner hain.
Customer: Achcha haan.
Executive: To unhone ye concern dala hai ki mere ko ye account band hi karwana hai.
Customer: Right.
Executive: Unko use bhi nahi karna hai kyunki main owner hoon aur humne unse document mangwaye unhone apna teen page ka GST PDF apna aadhar card sab bhej diya to prove karna hai ki wohi owner hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Right. Right sir.
Executive: To ab sir dekhiye hamare paas na isko disable karne ke alawa koi option nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dusri dusri cheez sir isme kya hota hai sir ki jab koi koi bhi hum refund karte hain IndiaMART koi bhi refund karta hai to wo jo bhi account mein karta hai ya to wo karta hai company ka current account naam ke sath ya fir jo GST ka owner hai uske naam ka check se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: In do scenario mein.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To dekhiye main disable to aaj hi karwa raha hoon isko but main refund hold kar dunga. Aap Shailesh ji se aap Shailesh ji se baat kariye aap unko convince kariye ki jo refund unke account mein aayega wo aapko de. Chahe aap uske liye 15 din ka time dijiye 20 din ka time dijiye 25 din ka time dijiye. Aapka 41733 amount nikalta hai refund ka.
Customer: Barabar lekin meri baat suniye agar payment maine kiya hai agar 41 IndiaMART ke paas hi rehne dijiye aur chahe to main deta hoon do saal ka mujhe Maho Trading Corporation ka aap update karwa dijiye usme. Aap refund kyun karwa rahe hain?
Executive: Main samjha nahi kya keh rahe ho.
Customer: Main ye bol raha hoon ke mera Maho Trading Corporation ka mera dusra firm chalu kiya hai barabar mere paas already mere paas GST hai. Usko mujhe activate karwana hai right.
Executive: Sir service service transfer nahi hoti hai sir IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Transfer mat karo wo payment hai na payment aap refund mat karo aur wo payment usme utilize karwao.
Executive: Sir uske liye bhi to company ke owner ka wo authorization chahiye at least Shailesh ji se boliye ki wo likh ke de de. Main ek baar baat kar leta hoon. Ek baar main baat kar leta hoon aapke team mein. Meri baat suniye agar haan ji meri baat suniye abhi aap main hai na aapko clear cut baat karta hoon kyunki already main dedh saal se IndiaMART chala raha hoon. Abhi hum log hum log pehle partner the abhi hamara separation ho gaya right. Abhi unka alag kam hai main wo usme se firm mein se nikal ke aaya already payment mere naam se sab hua hai ye sab baat aap Shailesh ji ko mat bataiye discuss mat kariye.
Executive: Nahi main Manish ji aapki boli hui baat samajh gaya dekhiye sir jo meri knowledge mein hai usme yahi do criteria hote hain but main aapke scenario mein ek baar ye pooch leta hoon accounts team se ki agar ye amount hum waha pe move karwana chahe wo move ho sakta hai. Sir ek baar baat kar lijiye sir already jisne account mein 259 se payment kiya hai na 259 number hai na mera aise aise bank ka usse maine payment kiya tha.
Customer: Haan dekhiye sir main agar company ki policy allow karti ho kyunki sir dekhiye legally hum bhi galat hai mujhe to aapka account aaj ke aaj band karna padega kyunki kal ko agar wo hume matlab hamare upar bhi legally ja sakte hain kyunki owner to rightfully wohi hai na sir is GST ke.
Customer: Haan aap band kar dijiye lekin ye jo payment fasa pada hai na uske iske liye aap mere account ke liye thoda mera preference dijiye kyunki already maine payment kiya hai.
Executive: Main unko to refund nahi karunga main unko to refund nahi karunga main refund hold dal dunga wo to main aapko assure kar raha hoon.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Agar meri company ki policy allow karti hogi transfer hona to wo main 100% karwaunga hi sir main apna customer kyun lose karna chaunga. Sir mera ek request hai mera ek request hai chahe to main mail bhi dal deta hoon Shailesh ji ko mere maine jo account se aapko paisa diya tha na wo aap refund karwa dijiye aur chahe to main dusra payment deke mera Maho Trading wala activate karwa dijiye.
Executive: Aapke mail dalne se aisa nahi hoga mail mere khyal se Shailesh ji ka aana chahiye. Par main ek baar fir bhi confirmation le leta hoon main ek baar baat kar leta hoon. Main unse ek baar baat karke fir aapko main detail mein batata hoon uska. Theek hai sir ek baar account team se account team se baat karunga na sir kyunki hamara to service band karwana kam hai but refund and all to accounts team handle karti hai wo department alag hai. Haan account ko baat kar lijiye aap. Main aapko account team se main baat kar leta hoon aur whatsapp pe main abhi Manisha ke sath aap touch mein rahiye main unko bata dunga jo bhi mera decision aata hai matlab jo bhi account team ka theek hai sir. Haan sir haan haan theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to transfer amount to another account.

- Wants to utilize the amount instead of refund.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to put refund on hold.

- Executive will check with accounts team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform customer after confirmation.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account, gst, payment, transfer
